name: Comet Madness
description:
Controls:

A and D for moving.

I haven't used Unity for like a year and I wanted to make a game to get used to it again. I like how it came out and I hope you too. It's just a little idea that i've gotten trying to make a game at a 3h game jam, "bean jam", but when a prototype was ready, my project crash while building it and I didn't have time to remake it. Even so I didn't let the project stay unfinished and I made some improvements and now here we are. Enjoy!
